block.stillwoods.bed.scare: You may not rest now; there are monsters behind you
gui.stillwoods.death.eyeless.1: and pain echoes through your body.
gui.stillwoods.death.eyeless.2: But you no longer have eyes to cry with,
gui.stillwoods.death.eyeless.3: or a tongue to scream with.
gui.stillwoods.death.eyeless.4: Now you suffer in silence and darkness.
gui.stillwoods.death.eyeless.5: Now you are one of us.
